alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 11:21AM CDT until November 05 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Southeastern Hancock County in southern Mississippi... * Until noon CDT. * At 1120 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Diamondhead, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 11 and 25. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
